Piece 4 is used as a tooltip. In ; the case of this SR, explain why it is unselectable. ; Unselectable is better than not displaying as the ; user has no idea why a record might be missing. ; 28-Oct-2005 JW SR13074: Exchange Rate type ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW LINK,YKEYY SET LINK=0 ;KEIN LINK ;no SET YANZAHL=YANZAHL+1 IF $DATA(@(YSEARCH(YI)))=1 IF YANZAHL>YMAXSHOW write "
",$$^WWWTEXT(33513) QUIT ;NICHT MEHR ALS 1000 ; "...More entries available" SET YTITLE="" WRITE YCR WRITE "
" SET YOFFS=YFIX ;OFFSETVARIABLE IF YOFFS'="" SET YOFFS=YOFFS_"," SET YIX=YI SET YQ=0 // SR15537: vvv IF YSUBMAX'=YI { IF (YSUB(YI)=YSUBS(YI)) && (($DATA(@(YSEARCH(YI)))=11) || ($DATA(@(YSEARCH(YI)))=10)) { SET YIX=YIX-1 } } FOR YX=1:1:YIX SET YOFFS=YOFFS_$GET(YSUBS(YX))_"," ;SETZEN DER NEUEN OFFSETVARIABLEN ;typeset the SET YFELD="" ;DATENSATZ ;data record SET YITEM="" ;ANZEIGETEXT VORBEREITEN ;prepare IF $DATA(@(YSEARCH(YX))) { ;DATEN VORHANDEN ;on hand SET YFELD=$GET(@(YSEARCH(YI))) IF YFELD'="" FOR YX=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)="" IF +$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)'=0 SET $PIECE(YITEM,Y,+$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX))=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,+$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)) } // SR15537: ^^^ IF YITEM="" SET YITEM=$GET(YSUBS(1))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(2))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(3))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(4))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(5))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(6))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(7))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(8))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(9))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(10))_" "_$GET(YSUBS(11)) SET YFOLINK=1 SET YVALUE=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,2) // SR15537: vvv IF YVALUE="" { SET YVALUE=$PIECE(YOFFSET,",",2) IF YDATEI="WWWPARAEXPL" SET YVALUE=YHEADER ;FIS;23441;2.6.03;STRUKTURANZEIGE HEADER ANZEIGEN, WENN STRUKTUR FEHLT FOR YVALUE(1)=1:1 { QUIT:$GET(YSUBS(YVALUE(1)))="" SET YVALUE=YVALUE_"-"_$GET(YSUBS(YVALUE(1))) SET YFOLINK=0 } } // SR15537: ^^^ IF YSUBMAX=(YI) IF $GET(YTARGETED)="" WRITE "" SET YTARGETED=1 ;VORSCHUB AUF TARGET ;FIS;23441;2.6.03;STRUKTURANZEIGE SET TOOLTIP="" ; Icon ; Bilddatei der Anzeige IF $GET(YBILD)="" SET YBILD="html" ;DATEN FORMATIEREN ;format SET YITEM1=YITEM ;SICHERUNG DER SATZES WEGEN RELATIONSFELDER DIE KEY FÃœR FORMUALAR SEIN KÃ–NNEN ;the quibble who KEY to its may IF YITEM'="" IF YDATEI'="" IF $DATA(^WWW003(0,YDATEI)) DO ;KLASSE VORHANDEN ;groovy on hand . NEW YDATX,YLA,XLFN,YLFN,YDATA . FOR YX=1:1 QUIT:$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX)="" DO ;ALLE FELDER PRUEFEN . . SET XLFN=$PIECE(YRECORD,",",YX) . . SET YINHALT=$PIECE(YITEM,Y,XLFN) ;INHALT BEREITSTELLEN ;purport . . DO SET $PIECE(YITEM,Y,XLFN)=YINHALT ;INHALT ZURUECKSICHERN ;purport . . . QUIT:YINHALT="" . . . SET YDATX = $GET(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,XLFN,1)) ;KLASSENDEFINITION . . . SET YTYP = $PIECE(YDATX,Y,3) ;FELDTYPE . . . SET YLA = $PIECE(YDATX,Y,4) ;FELDLÃ„NGE ;field size . . . IF YTYP=3 SET YLA=23 . . . SET YQ=0 ;KEINE RELATION ;no . . . IF YINHALT'="" IF $PIECE(YDATX,Y,8)'="" DO QUIT ;RELATION NUR WENN KEINE SUMME ;only when no sum . . . . NEW YDAT,YKE,YFE,YSAT . . . . SET YDAT = $PIECE(YDATX,Y,8) . . . . SET YKE = $PIECE(YDATX,Y,9) . . . . IF YKE'="" IF $EXTRACT(YKE)'="""" QUIT . . . . SET YFE = $PIECE(YDATX,Y,10) . . . . IF +YFE=0 SET YFE=1 . . . . SET YDATA = $GET(^WWW001(0,YDAT,1)) . . . . SET YSAT="^"_YDAT_"("_$$^WWWYM(YDAT,1) . . . . IF YKE'="" IF $EXTRACT(YKE)'="," SET YSAT=YSAT_YKE_"," . . . . IF $PIECE(YDATA,Y,8)'=4 SET YSAT=YSAT_""""_$TRANSLATE(YINHALT,"""")_""""_",1)" . . . . IF $PIECE(YDATA,Y,8)=4 SET YSAT=YSAT_""""_$TRANSLATE(YINHALT,"""")_""""_",1)" . . . . SET YSAT(1)=$PIECE($$^WWWSETL(YSAT),Y,YFE) . . . . IF YKEYNUM=XLFN SET YTITLE=YINHALT_" ("_YSAT(1)_")" ;WENN KEY=RELATION DANN TEXTANZEIGE ;when . . . . IF YSAT(1)'="" SET YINHALT=YSAT(1) SET YQ=1 . . . IF YQ=0 DO ;EINZELFORMAT OHNE RELATION ;without . . . . QUIT:YINHALT="" . . . . SET YINHALT=$$GetLiteral^WWWTR(YTYP,YINHALT) . . . . IF YTYP=5 SET YINHALT=$EXTRACT("*****************",1,$LENGTH(YINHALT)) QUIT . . . . IF YTYP=8||(YTYP=12)||(YTYP=18) SET YINHALT=$EXTRACT(" ",1,YLA-$LENGTH(YINHALT))_YINHALT //SR13074 . . . . IF YTYP=3 SET YINHALT=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YINHALT,"|",1),1,30) SET:YINHALT'="" YINHALT=YINHALT_"..." QUIT . . . . IF YINHALT'="" IF $FIND(YINHALT,"|") SET YINHALT=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YINHALT,"|",1),1,30) SET:YINHALT'="" YINHALT=YINHALT_"..." QUIT DO ;NORMALE SPRUNG ;rift . ;LINK 1 ohne Daten ;Without Data .
